description:
'''Hayley Dee Westenra''' (born 10 April 1987) is a New Zealand [[classical crossover]] singer. Her first internationally released album, ''[[Pure (Hayley Westenra album)|Pure]]'', reached number one on the UK classical charts in 2003 and has sold more than two million copies worldwide, making it one of the fastest selling albums in her country's history.

She is one of the youngest [[List of UNICEF Goodwill Ambassadors|UNICEF Ambassadors]] to date.

Westenra has sung in English, [[Māori language|Māori]], [[Irish language|Irish]], Welsh, Spanish, Italian, German, French, Portuguese, [[Latin language|Latin]], Japanese, [[Standard Mandarin Chinese]], [[Catalan language|Catalan]], and [[Taiwanese Hokkien]].
